In the near future, aging was controlled to avoid overpopulation, time becoming the main bargaining chip to survive and also get luxuries. Thus, the rich live longer than the poor, who must negotiate their existence, usually limited to 25 years of life. When Will Salas (Justin Timberlake) receives a mysterious gift, is being chased by the guardians of time for a crime he did not commit, but he kidnaps Sylvia (Amanda Seyfried), the daughter of a tycoon, and the new relationship between victim and perpetrator arises a powerful weapon with the system and organization that commands the future of people.
